During the **spring semester of 2024**,
we will be starting with R from the very beginning.
We are meeting on **Fridays from 12-1pm**. Join us:

-   In person in Columbus (**Howlett 340** with Jessica Cooperstone & Horacio Lopez-Nicora)\
-   In Wooster (**Gerlaugh 122** with Jelmer Poelstra)\
-   Through **Zoom** ([sign up](https://forms.gle/eYkMvmJShrcANUrt5) to receive the Zoom link)

_For an overview of all previous Code Club sessions, including from previous semesters,_
_see the **[Previous sessions page](/pages/previous.qmd)**._

:::
